erpnext.notes: Upstream vendored as a git submodule; initial extraction targets DocType JSON as the honest schema source.

keycloak.notes: Vendored upstream as a git submodule; generating CIF/mappings/capabilities from Admin REST representations under core/src/main/java/org/keycloak/representations/idm.

killbill.notes: CIF/mappings/capabilities added; upstream vendored as a git submodule; CIF extraction script available at scripts/domain-atlas/extract-killbill-cif.mjs.

mautic.notes: CIF/mappings/capabilities present; upstream vendored as a git submodule; extraction script: scripts/domain-atlas/extract-mautic-cif.mjs.

odoo.notes: Upstream pinned; seeded CIF extraction (res.partner + res.partner.category subset) via scripts/domain-atlas/extract-odoo.mjs.

stripe.notes: Example provider validates schemas; upstream pinned; CIF/mappings/capabilities present.

vault.notes: CIF/mappings/capabilities present; upstream vendored as a git submodule (BUSL-1.1); extraction script: scripts/domain-atlas/extract-vault-cif.mjs.
